about_the_game:
Step into Astronormous Survivor, a top-down 3D space combat game where you start small and steadily build your ship into a staggering powerhouse. Inspired by 90s mecha toys, this game lets you customize and expand your spacecraft, taking on waves of progressively larger enemies in a vast and thrilling universe.

Massive Growth Potential: Begin with a modest ship and build it up to immense size, adding modules, weapons, and defenses. The more you grow, the more formidable foes you’ll encounter, each battle more epic than the last.

90s Toy-Inspired Design: Immerse yourself in a retro aesthetic that brings the charm of 90s mecha toys to life, with colorful, detailed parts and upgrades.

Dynamic Space Combat: Engage in strategic, high-intensity combat where movement and positioning are key. Equip your ship with powerful tools to dodge, defend, and defeat relentless waves.

Expansive Enemy Scaling: Encounter enemies that scale with your ship’s size and power. From nimble attackers to gigantic battleships, each battle introduces new challenges.

Extensive Customization: Experiment with a vast array of modules and enhancements, building a ship tailored to your combat style and adaptable to different challenges.

Gameplay:
Navigate through a procedurally generated galaxy, facing tougher foes as you expand and enhance your ship. Gather resources, collect rare modules, and forge a uniquely powerful spacecraft ready to take on colossal adversaries.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8Gb+, DirectX 11+
